schema.description: Configuration for forwarding metrics from Atlas LWC to AWS CloudWatch
schema.title: Cluster Config

___email.description: Email address of the service owner

___dimensions.description: Details about AWS CloudWatch dimension that will be created

___account.description: AWS account to send the metric to. Typically $(nf.account)

___metricName.description: Name of the metric that will be created in CloudWatch

___region.description: AWS region to send the metric to

___checksToSkip.description: The list of validations to skip
